item.description:
Our member Mariko-san sent me a message about 3.11 memorial events happens in Boston area.

Here's the message from Mariko-san

I'm having a tsunami art auction on 3/9 at Hancock 309 Gallery in Dorchester, to benefit the tsunami orphans in Japan. It's been two years since the devastating earthquake and tsunami hit Japan. People are moving onto new things, but the orphans still need our help. We want to send the message to Japan that they are not an old news and that they are not forgotten. 

Remaining special events include: 
3/9 (sat) - 6pm to 9:30pm LIVE AND SILENT AUCTION 
3/11 (mon) - 7pm to 8:30pm MEMORIAL SERVICE & COMMUNITY GATHERING 
3/23 (sat) - 11:30am to 12:30pm TALK: Disaster Management (By Office of Emergency Management, City of Boston) 

More info: http://tsunamiartauction.blogspot.com 
Sign up: http://tsunami-hancock309.eventbrite.com

Please signup using above link.
item.name: Tsunami Art Auction: LIVE AND SILENT AUCTION
